TopicTitle: Kerbal game "broken" after planting flag on Mun contract

Articles.Content:
I have 0.90 32 bit

Installed with:

-FAR

-RealChute

-NavBallDockingAlignmentIndicator

I proceeded with the plant the flag on the Mun contract, landed on the Mun and deployed the flag - except the plaque never appeared and I lost control of the Kerbal .. I had another older lander 1km away and switched to him, planted a flag and again lost control of the Kerbal ... From there I exited the game and reloaded, now I can't get into any facility on the launch pad, except for obtaining new contracts, but then cannot exit out of it and essentially the entire game breaks for me.

Has anyone experienced this? I have to start over as there is no way to proceed with launches, tracking, building, nothing!
